subject: RE: Front B - drafting request
body:
Hi Team,
I would just like to reiterate the importance of getting these drawings set up in the correct way to minimise the effort of updating information when required. Where possible please try to use the same reference files multiple times.
If you have any concerns or questions about doing this, please don’t hesitate to get in contact.
Regards
Nathan
From:
Abitong, Dinesto <Dinesto.Abitong@wsp.com>
Sent:
Thursday, 3 April 2025 2:12 PM
To:
Mirsepassi, Nick <Nick.Mirsepassi@wsp.com>; Cabangon, Lowell <Lowell.Cabangon@wsp.com>; Alviz, Geno <Geno.Alviz@wsp.com>; De Leon, Darwin <Darwin.DeLeon@wsp.com>; Losabia, Jerwin <Jerwin.Losabia@wsp.com>
Cc:
Narayana, Manjesh <Manjesh.Narayana@wsp.com>; Lovett, Nathan <Nathan.Lovett@wsp.com>; Christine, Yoshe <Yoshe.Christine@wsp.com>
Subject:
RE: Front B - drafting request
Hi Nick,
These new drawings are achievable on the said time frame. The team will start next week to prioritize the markups by Yoshe and at the same time the model is still on going hopefully Arnel might have it finalize COB tomorrow.
Regards,
Dinesto

Subject:
Front B - drafting request
Dear All,
We have some new sheets to be drafted for the Front B design package, focusing on the steel sets and Y-junction sequencing. These will serve as base drafts, with further details to be added as the design progresses. It’s important that we get these base versions completed within a reasonable timeframe (i.e. 2–3 days).
While these drawings may be subject to updates following the alignment review, it's critical that we get started as soon as possible.
@Lovett, Nathan
– please ensure the drawings are set up using Xrefs to minimise rework when changes occur.
@Christine, Yoshe
– can you please upload the new sheets to the Bluebeam session and provide drawing numbers as needed. An advanced copy is also attached for reference.
Please confirm if the requested timeframe is achievable. If anything is unclear, don’t hesitate to reach out.
Thanks,
Nick
Nick Mirsepassi
Tunnel Engineer/Data Scientist
Nick.Mirsepassi@wsp.com
WSP Australia Pty Limited
Level 27, 680 George Street
Sydney, 2000
Australia
